about_the_game:
Bunker Breakout is a fast-paced, toon-shaded 3D retro shooter that combines retro-inspired action with an emotionally charged narrative. Trapped in a deadly underground bunker, you are a father fighting to escape and reunite with your family in a world teetering on the brink of collapse.

Key Features:

  • Adrenaline-Pumping Combat: Wield an arsenal of classic weapons, including shotguns and pistols, as you battle through waves of enemies. Every bullet counts, so manage your resources wisely.

  • Retro Meets Modern: Experience the charm of retro shooters, reimagined with a bold, toon-shaded art style.

  • Engaging Enemy Variety: Unique enemy types, each with distinct behaviors and challenges, keeping every encounter fresh and intense.

  • Resource Management: Scavenge for limited ammo, health, and armor as you navigate the bunker’s treacherous environments.

Will you have the strength to survive, escape the bunker, and reunite with the ones you love? Your family is waiting...

content_descriptors.notes: Bunker Breakout contains depictions of graphic violence, such as decapitations, severed limbs, bodies exploding, etc.

  • Resource Management: Scavenge for limited ammo, health, and armor as you navigate the bunker’s treacherous environments.

Will you have the strength to survive, escape the bunker, and reunite with the ones you love? Your family is waiting...

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with shader model 4.0 capabilities.
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Bunker Breakout

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD FX 6350 / Intel i3 4150
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 740
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support DirectX 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel i5-9600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Bunker Breakout is a fast-paced, toon-shaded 3D retro shooter where you fight to escape a deadly bunker and reunite with your family. Face unique enemies, manage scarce resources, and experience retro-inspired combat in a gripping, action-packed story. How far will you go to save them?
